borderRadius.$description: accordion.borderRadius — Accordion container border radius (4px). Subtle rounding for the outer container.

borderWidth.$description: accordion.borderWidth — Accordion item border width (1px). Thin separators between accordion items.

horizontal.$description: accordion.content.padding.horizontal — Content horizontal padding (16px). Matches header horizontal padding for visual alignment.

vertical.$description: accordion.content.padding.vertical — Content vertical padding (12px). Comfortable reading space for body content.

gap.$description: accordion.gap — Gap between accordion items (0). Items are flush with borders providing separation. Set to a spacing token for separated variant.

fontSize.$description: accordion.header.fontSize — Header font size (16px). Standard body size for section headers. Readable without competing with page headings.

fontWeight.$description: accordion.header.fontWeight — Header font weight. Medium weight provides subtle emphasis distinguishing headers from body content.

horizontal.$description: accordion.header.padding.horizontal — Header horizontal padding (16px). Comfortable click target with room for text and chevron icon.

vertical.$description: accordion.header.padding.vertical — Header vertical padding (12px). Balanced spacing for readable header text.

size.$description: accordion.icon.size — Chevron icon size (16px). Proportional to header text for visual balance.

duration.$description: accordion.icon.transition.duration — Chevron rotation duration (200ms). Matches content expand/collapse timing.

easing.$description: accordion.icon.transition.easing — Chevron rotation easing. Smooth rotation for natural open/close motion.
